org.bubblecloud.zigbee.util

Class Integers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.util.Integers

  • public class Integers
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class that contains method for:
    - creating long, int, and short from int[]
    - extracting a byte configuration from a:long, int, and short
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi

      • getByte

        public static final byte getByte(long x,
           int n)
        Parameters:
        x - the long containing the data
        n - the index of the byte to return
        Returns:
        return the n-th byte of the representation of x

      • getByteAsInteger

        public static final int getByteAsInteger(long x,
                   int n)
        Parameters:
        x - the long containing the data
        n - the index of the byte to return
        Returns:
        return the n-th byte as int of the representation of x thus it returns always value between 0 and 255

      • readInt24bit

        public static int readInt24bit(byte[] src,
               int pos)
        Parameters:
        src - an array of byte that contains the encoded 24bit int
        pos - the point where to start from reading the 24bit
        Returns:
        an int decoded from the data array
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • writeInt24bit

        public static int writeInt24bit(byte[] dest,
                int pos,
                int data)
        Parameters:
        dest - an array of byte that will store the encoded 24bit int
        pos - the point where to start writing the 24bit
        data - the 24bit to write on the array
        Returns:
        the number of byte wrote on the array
        Since:
        0.2.0
